properties.description: Sub Master job to orchestrate multiple pipelines run. Each pipeline correspond to one tab in the Excel workbook.

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

properties.description: Master job to orchestrate multiple pipelines run. Each pipeline correspond to one tab in the Excel workbook.

activities.name: ProcessOpsWorkbookSubMaster_pl
activities.description: Sub Master to run children pipelines in parallel

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT CONCAT(CASE WHEN Error_Count = 0 THEN '!!! ERROR SOME EXCEL SHEETS MAY NOT BE LOADED: SUCCESSFUL LOAD : ' ELSE '!!! ERROR SOME EXCEL SHEETS MAY NOT BE LOADED: FAILED LOAD : ' END,Work_Sheet, ' - ', Work_Book) AS Message_Header,
Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name, Error_Table, Error_Count 
FROM (
SELECT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN 'audit.OPS_Certification_Error'
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN 'audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error'
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Table,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Count
FROM (
SELECT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, wb.Asset_ID, wb.Fund_ID,
ra.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Email
FROM [audit].[OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List] wb
JOIN [relational].[Asset] ra 
ON wb.Asset_Id = ra.Asset_ID AND wb.Fund_Id = ra.Fund_ID  AND ra.record_deleted_flag = 0 AND wb.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') x
)z;

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT '!!! PIPELINE ERROR : SOME OR ALL EXCEL SHEETS MAY NOT BE LOADED' AS Message_Header,
Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name, Error_Table, Error_Count 
FROM (
SELECT Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name,
'None' AS Error_Table,
'None'AS Error_Count
FROM (
SELECT ra.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Email
FROM relational.Asset ra 
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 
AND ra.Asset_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Asset_ID}' 
AND ra.Fund_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Fund_ID}') x
)z;

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT CONCAT(CASE WHEN Error_Count = 0 THEN 'SUCCESSFUL LOAD : ' ELSE 'FAILED LOAD : ' END,Work_Sheet, ' - ', Work_Book) AS Message_Header,
Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name, Error_Table, Error_Count 
FROM (
SELECT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN 'audit.OPS_Certification_Error'
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN 'audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error'
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Table,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Count
FROM (
SELECT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, wb.Asset_ID, wb.Fund_ID,
ra.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Email
FROM [audit].[OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List] wb
JOIN [relational].[Asset] ra 
ON wb.Asset_Id = ra.Asset_ID AND wb.Fund_Id = ra.Fund_ID  AND ra.record_deleted_flag = 0 AND wb.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') x
)z;

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

properties.description: Sub Master job to orchestrate multiple pipelines run. Each pipeline correspond to one tab in the Excel workbook.

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx
Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

MasterPipeline.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx-Certifications

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT FROM (
 SELECT DISTINCT LIS.Work_Book, LIS.Work_Sheet FROM 
 audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List LIS
 JOIN audit.OPS_Certification_Error ERR
 ON LIS.Work_Book = ERR.Source_File  
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = ERR.Source_Sub_File
 WHERE LIS.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = '@{pipeline().parameters.Certifications}'
)x

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx
Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT FROM (
 SELECT DISTINCT LIS.Work_Book, LIS.Work_Sheet FROM 
 audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List LIS
 JOIN audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error ERR
 ON LIS.Work_Book = ERR.Source_File  
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = ERR.Source_Sub_File
 WHERE LIS.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = '@{pipeline().parameters.TimberSales}'
)x

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Certification_Type as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS as string,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Certification_Type_Code\n      ,Certification_Type\n  FROM relational.OPS_Certification_Type\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOpsCertificationType
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Asset_ID\n      ,Fund_ID\n      ,Reporting_Period\n      ,Certification_ID\n  FROM relational.OPS_Certification',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalCertification
LookupCertificationType derive(CertificationTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Certification_Type_Code_Lkp), "Certification Type/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		CertificationEndDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Certification_End_Date), "Certification End Date/", ""),
		ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Certification_ID),"Null Certification ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalCertificationIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Certification_Certification_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Certification_Asset_ID_Lkp,Certification_Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Certitication ID not belong to Asset/"),"")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalCertificationIDValidateMsg,
CertificationTypeValidateMsg,
CertificationEndDateValidateMsg,
ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(CertificationTypeValidateMsg, 
CertificationEndDateValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalCertificationIDValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Validation_Flag,
		Certification_Type,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		RowNumber,
		Certification_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Certification_Type_Lkp,
		CertificationTypeValidateMsg,
		CertificationEndDateValidateMsg,
		ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Certification_ID = toInteger(Certification_ID),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Next_Audit_Date = toDate(Next_Audit_Date),
		Certification_Date = toDate(Certification_Date),
		Certification_End_Date = toDate(Certification_End_Date),
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS = toInteger(Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS),
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS = toInteger(Number_of_Open_Major_CARS),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOpsCertificationType select(mapColumn(
		Certification_Type_Code_Lkp = Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Type_Lkp = Certification_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCertificationTypeLkp
LookupCertification, SelectCertificationTypeLkp lookup(Certification_Type == Certification_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(Certification_Type_Code_Lkp, false),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCertificationType
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalCertification select(mapColumn(
		Certification_Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Certification_Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Certification_Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Certification_ID_Lkp = Certification_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCertificationLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectCertificationLkp lookup(Certification_ID == Certification_Certification_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCertification
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Minor_CARS as integer,
		Major_CARS as integer,
		Source_File as string,
		Source_Sub_File as string,
		Error_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Certification_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Minor_CARS = Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS = Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset sink(input(
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Asset_Id as string,
		Fund_Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Asset_Id = Asset_ID,
		Fund_Id = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OpsWorkbookWorksheetList
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate

parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS as integer,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS as integer,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Minor_CARS as integer,
		Major_CARS as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Minor_CARS = Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS = Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational

parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS as integer,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS as integer,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceUpdate
SourceUpdate select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(Certification_ID)))) ~> AlterRowUpdate
AlterRowUpdate sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Minor_CARS as integer,
		Major_CARS as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Certification_ID'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Minor_CARS = Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Major_CARS = Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_or_Export as string,
		Species as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency as string,
		Month as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Production_Cost as string,
		Budget_Unit_Stumpage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Species_Type]\n  WHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalSpeciesType
source(output(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Sales_Unit_Code\n      ,Sales_Unit\n  FROM relational.OPS_Sales_Unit\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalSalesUnit
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Price_Point_Code\n      ,Price_Point\n  FROM relational.OPS_Price_Point\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDeliveryPoint
LookupPricePointFromDeliveryPoint derive(SpeciesTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), "Species/", ""),
		SalesUnitValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp), "Sales Unit/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		DeliveryPointValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Price_Point_Code_Lkp), "Delivery Point/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,
SalesUnitValidateMsg,
DeliveryPointValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export = Domestic_or_Export,
		Product = Product_Type,
		Delivery_Point_Code = Delivery_Point,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code = Currency,
		Sales_Month = Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage = Budget_Unit_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code = Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp,
		Species_Code = Species_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,
SalesUnitValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
DeliveryPointValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export = Domestic_or_Export,
		Species,
		Product = Product_Type,
		Delivery_Point_Code = Delivery_Point,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Unit,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code = Currency,
		Sales_Month = Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage = Budget_Unit_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Sales_Quantity, 19, 4),
		Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Production_Cost = toDecimal(Production_Cost, 19, 4),
		Stumpage = toDecimal(Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Average_Sales_Price = toDecimal(Average_Sales_Price, 19, 4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Budget_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Production_Cost, 19, 4),
		Budget_Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Budget_Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Price_Point = toDecimal(Price_Point, 19, 4),
		Month = toDate(Month)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalSpeciesType select(mapColumn(
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Species_Lkp = Species
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSpeciesTypeLkp
LookupSalesUnit, SelectSpeciesTypeLkp lookup(Species == Species_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSpeciesType
RelationalSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp = Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Lkp = Sales_Unit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSalesUnitLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectSalesUnitLkp lookup(Sales_Unit == Sales_Unit_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSalesUnit
RelationalDeliveryPoint select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code_Lkp = Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point_Lkp = Price_Point
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPricePointLkp
LookupSpeciesType, SelectPricePointLkp lookup(Delivery_Point == Price_Point_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupPricePointFromDeliveryPoint
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Sales_Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Species_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(input(
		Error_ID as long,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Month as date,
		Source_File as string,
		Source_Sub_File as string,
		Error_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Sales_Unit,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Month,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset sink(input(
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Asset_Id as string,
		Fund_Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Asset_Id = Asset_ID,
		Fund_Id = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OpsWorkbookWorksheetList

parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Sales_Month as date,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Sales_Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Species_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Month as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Month
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational
